value:
It feels a little tight up top... Are we
sure the measurements are correct?

A loving heart is the same whether
beorc or laguz.

If being a bride means thinking about
the one you love and hoping for their
happiness, then...perhaps I'm a bride.

I will grow strong so I can protect the
person I love... You know the feeling,
don't you, $Nu?

If I stood beside Empress Sanaki with
her dressed as a bride... I think we
would make a brilliant pair!

My name is Sigrun. I'm here to deliver
an invitation to the festival—directly
from $Nf!

I can abide no loveless act
directed at the empress.
Love has a force all its own!

I need to get used to these
clothes... No time to waste!

You have my thanks. Your
support will not go to waste.

I am Sigrun, commander of the Holy
Guard of Begnion. I had to rush to
put this wedding attire on in time.

If you ask me, spending time with the
one you love is the definition of joy.$k$pThat joy doesn't come freely—it's
something you have to protect and
nurture with your own two hands...$k$pIt's a vow you must make to protect
what is precious to you...which is
something even I can understand.$k$pI will continue my fight—and I hope
you do too, $Nu.$k$pProtect and support those close
to you...and stride toward your
future, together.
やっ！
参ります！
きゃああっ！
だめです…！
I pledge my love.
For the love of my life!
Love conquers all!
Peace through love!
My love stays…
Hehehe
I am Sigrun…and suddenly a bride, it seems!
Can you hold this for me while I fix my dress?
The apostle dressed as a bride, too. She must have been adorable!
Dressing like a bride…it's quite a change for me.
Does this...look good on me? Thank you. You're very kind to say so.
To be with the one I love… *sigh* I'm filled with joy at the mere thought of it.
I am elated to be here with you...for today, tomorrow, and beyond…
Yes, dear?
I'm committed!
Happy beyond words…
